library(readr)

# Company Database {-#company-database}

We wrote a web scrapper in Python to pull company data from [Glassdoor](https://www.glassdoor.com/member/home/index.htm).  Below are relevant companies by industry that are hiring people for data oriented positions!

```{r echo=FALSE}
Job_Postings = Job_Postings %>%
  mutate(Reviews =  paste0('<a  target=_blank href=', `Reviews Link`, '>', Reviews,'</a>' ),
          Salaries =  paste0('<a  target=_blank href=', `Salaries Link`, '>', Salaries,'</a>' ),
          Jobs =  paste0('<a  target=_blank href=', `Jobs Link`, '>', Jobs,'</a>' ))


datatable( Job_Postings[c(1,2,9,3,4,5,6)]
 ,escape = F
 ,extensions = c("SearchPanes", "Select", "Buttons")
 ,options = list(
    dom = "Btip",
    buttons = list("searchPanes"),
    language = list(searchPanes = list(collapse = "Filter Rows")),
    columnDefs = list(
      list(searchPanes = list(controls = FALSE), targets = 0:3),
      list(className = "dt-center", targets = 0:7),
      list(searchPanes = list(show = FALSE), targets = 4:7)
      )
    )
)

```
